mapper.select: select u.`name` as `owner`, t.`money`, t.`name`, t.`expectedDate`, cust.`name` as `customerId`, t.`stage`, t.`type`, t.`source`, a.`name` as `activityId`, con.`fullname` as `contactsId`, t.`createBy`, t.`createTime`, t.`editBy`, t.`editTime`, t.`description`, t.`contactSummary`, t.`nextContactTime` from tbl_tran t inner join tbl_customer cust on t.`customerId`=cust.`id` left outer join tbl_activity a on a.`id`=t.`activityId` left outer join tbl_contacts con on con.`id`=t.`contactsId` inner join tbl_user u on u.`id`=t.`owner` where t.`id`=#{id}

select t.`owner`, t.`money`, t.`name`, t.`expectedDate`, cust.`name` as `customerId`, t.`stage`, t.`type`, t.`source`, a.`name` as `activityId`, con.`fullname` as `contactsId`, t.`description`, t.`contactSummary`, t.`nextContactTime`, t.`createBy` from tbl_tran t inner join tbl_customer cust on t.`customerId`=cust.`id` left outer join tbl_activity a on a.`id`=t.`activityId` left outer join tbl_contacts con on con.`id`=t.`contactsId` where t.`id`=#{id}

select count(*) from(
select t.`id` from tbl_tran t inner join tbl_customer cust on t.`customerId`=cust.`id` inner join tbl_user u on u.`id`=t.`owner` left outer join tbl_contacts con on con.`id`=t.`contactsId`
u.`name` like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.`name` like '%' #{name} '%'
and cust.`name` like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and t.`stage` like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.`type` like '%' #{transactionType} '%'
and t.`source` like '%' #{source} '%'
and con.`fullname` like '%' #{contactsFullName} '%'
) tbl_temp

select t.`id`, u.`name` as `owner`, t.`name`, cust.`name` as `customerId`, t.`stage`, t.`type`, t.`source`, con.`fullname` as `contactsId` from tbl_tran t inner join tbl_customer cust on t.`customerId`=cust.`id` inner join tbl_user u on u.`id`=t.`owner` left outer join tbl_contacts con on con.`id`=t.`contactsId`
u.`name` like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.`name` like '%' #{name} '%'
and cust.`name` like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and t.`stage` like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.`type` like '%' #{transactionType} '%'
and t.`source` like '%' #{source} '%'
and con.`fullname` like '%' #{contactsFullName} '%'
order by t.`createTime` desc
